text.div:
FHIR Implementation Guide for ABDM

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

https://nrces.in/ndhm/fhir/r4/ImplementationGuide/ndhm.in

name: FHIR Implementation Guide for ABDM
title: FHIR Implementation Guide for ABDM
publisher: National Resource Center for EHR Standards

resource.name: StructureDefinition/Organization
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the Organization resource to searching for and fetching an Organization associated with a patient or provider.

resource.name: StructureDefinition/Condition
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the Condition resource to record, search, and fetch a list of conditions associated with a patient.

resource.name: StructureDefinition/MedicationRequest
resource.description: The MedicationRequest resource can be used to record a patient’s medication prescription or order. This profile sets minimum expectations for the MedicationRequest resource to record, search, and fetch medications associated with a patient.

resource.name: StructureDefinition/MedicationStatement
resource.description: The MedicationStatement resource can be used to record a patient’s medication information. It is used to record the information about the medications consumed by the patient in the past, present, or future.

resource.name: StructureDefinition/Observation
resource.description: Observation resource represents an individual laboratory test and result value, a “nested” panel (such as a microbial susceptibility panel) which references other observations, or rarely a laboratory test with component result values. This profile sets minimum expectations for the Observation resource to record, search, and fetch laboratory test results associated with a patient.

resource.name: StructureDefinition/ObservationVitalSigns
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the ObservationVitalSigns to record, search, and fetch the details of the vital signs of a patient.

resource.name: StructureDefinition/ObservationLifestyle
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the ObservationLifestyle to record, search, and fetch the details of the lifestyle of the patient.

resource.name: StructureDefinition/ObservationWomenHealth
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for ObservationWomenHealth to record, search, and fetch the details of women’s health.

resource.name: StructureDefinition/ObservationGeneralAssessment
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the ObservationGeneralAssessment to record, search, and fetch the details of the general health assessment of a patient.

resource.name: StructureDefinition/ObservationPhysicalActivity
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the ObservationPhysicalActivity to record, search, and fetch the details of the physical activities of a patient.

resource.name: StructureDefinition/ObservationBodyMeasurement
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the ObservationBodyMeasurement to record, search, and fetch the details of the body measurements of the patient.

resource.name: StructureDefinition/WellnessRecord
resource.description: The Clinical Artifact represents regular wellness information of patients typically through the Patient Health Record (PHR) application covering clinical information such as vitals, physical examination, general wellness, women wellness, etc., that can be shared across the health ecosystem.

resource.name: StructureDefinition/OPConsultRecord
resource.description: The Clinical Artifact represents the outpatient visit consultation note which may include clinical information on any OP examinations, procedures along with medication administered, and advice that can be shared across the health ecosystem.

resource.name: StructureDefinition/Appointment
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the Appointment resource to searching for and fetching information about a booking of a healthcare event among patient(s), practitioner(s), related person(s), and/or device(s) for a specific date/time for a patient.

resource.name: StructureDefinition/PractitionerRole
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the PractitionerRole resource to record, search, and fetch the practitioner role for a practitioner.

resource.name: StructureDefinition/AllergyIntolerance
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the AllergyIntolerance resource to record, search, and fetch allergies/adverse reactions associated with a patient.

resource.name: StructureDefinition/Practitioner
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the Practitioner resource to record, search, and fetch basic demographics and other administrative information about an individual practitioner.

resource.name: StructureDefinition/Encounter
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the Encounter resource to record, search, and fetch basic encounter information for an individual patient.

resource.name: StructureDefinition/Patient
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the Patient resource to record, search, and fetch basic demographics and other administrative information about an individual patient.

resource.name: StructureDefinition/Procedure
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the Procedure resource to record, search, and fetch procedures associated with a patient.

resource.name: StructureDefinition/DocumentReference
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for searching and fetching patient documents including the Clinical Notes using the DocumentReference resource.

resource.name: StructureDefinition/CarePlan
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the CarePlan resource to record, search, and fetch assessment and plan of treatment data associated with a patient.

resource.name: StructureDefinition/Binary
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the Binary resource to searching for and fetching the data of a single raw artifact as digital content accessible in its native format of a patient.

resource.name: StructureDefinition/BrandName
resource.description: This Extention sets minimum expectations for the Brandname element to searching for and fetching a Brandname associated with vaccine.

resource.name: StructureDefinition/DiagnosticReportImaging
resource.description: This profile represents the set of information related to the Imaging diagnosis report generated by imaging services like Radiology, Cardiology, Endoscopy, etc. are ordered for the patient.

resource.name: StructureDefinition/DiagnosticReportImaging
resource.description: This profile represents the set of information related to the Laboratory diagnosis report generated by the laboratory services like Complete Blood Count, Basic Metabolic Panel, Lipid Panel, Urinalysis, etc. are ordered for the patient.

resource.name: StructureDefinition/DiagnosticReportRecord
resource.description: The Clinical Artifact represents diagnostic reports including Radiology and Laboratory reports that can be shared across the health ecosystem.

resource.name: StructureDefinition/DischargeSummaryRecord
resource.description: Clinical document used to represent the discharge summary record for ABDM HDE data set.

resource.name: StructureDefinition/DocumentBundle
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the DocumentBundle that includes all resources into a single instance with containing context to act as an exchangeable clinical document.

resource.name: StructureDefinition/FamilyMemberHistory
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the FamilyMemberHistory resource for searching and fetching significant health conditions of a person related to the patient in the context of care.

resource.name: StructureDefinition/ImagingStudy
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the ImagingStudy resource to searching for and fetching the content produced in a DICOM imaging study.

resource.name: StructureDefinition/Media
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the Media resource to searching for and fetching media like a photo, video, or audio recording acquired or used in healthcare, associated with a patient or provider.

resource.name: StructureDefinition/Immunization
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the Immunization resource to record, fetch and search immunization history associated with a patient.

resource.name: StructureDefinition/ImmunizationRecommendation
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the ImmunizationRecommendation resource to support the next immunization to be taken by the patient.

resource.name: StructureDefinition/ImmunizationRecord
resource.description: The Clinical Artifact represents the Immunization records with any additional documents such as vaccine certificate, the next immunization recommendations, etc. This can be further shared across the health ecosystem.

resource.name: StructureDefinition/PrescriptionRecord
resource.description: The Clinical Artifact represents the medication advice to the patient in compliance with the Pharmacy Council of India (PCI) guidelines, which can be shared across the health ecosystem.

resource.name: StructureDefinition/HealthDocumentRecord
resource.description: The Clinical Artifact represents the unstructured historical health records as a single of multiple Health Record Documents generally uploaded by the patients through the Health Locker and can be shared across the health ecosystem.

resource.name: StructureDefinition/ServiceRequest
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the ServiceRequest resource to searching for and fetching information about services like a request for a procedure or diagnostic or other services to be planned, proposed, or performed associated with a patient or provider.

resource.name: StructureDefinition/Specimen
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the Specimen resource to searching for and fetching information regarding a sample to be used for the analysis of a patient.

resource.name: EncounterTypes
resource.description: This value set includes codes from SNOMED CT

resource.name: Diagnostic Report Type
resource.description: The Diagnostic Report Type Value Set is a set of types supported for Diagnostic Reports and notes.

resource.name: Diagnosis Use
resource.description: This value set contains a set of SNOMED CT codes for Diagnosis type

resource.name: Practitioner Role
resource.description: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the role of a Practitioner.

resource.name: Route Of Administration
resource.description: This value set contains a set of SNOMED CT codes for Route Of Administration

resource.name: Specimen Types
resource.description: This value set contains a set of SNOMED CT codes for Specimen Types

resource.name: Medicine Codes
resource.description: This Value Set covers: Clinical Drugs from SNOMED CT International Edition, Clinical Drugs and Branded Medicines (Real Clinical Drugs) from Common Drug Codes for India (National Extension). For more information refer: [https://www.nrces.in/services/national-releases](https://www.nrces.in/services/national-releases)

resource.name: Vaccine Codes
resource.description: This value set covers : All leaf nodes (preferred term) of children of Vaccine product containing bacteria antigen (medicinal product) and Vaccine product containing virus antigen (medicinal product) of the SNOMED CT

resource.name: Lifestyle
resource.description: This value set covers LOINC Codes for type of Lifestyle

resource.name: Women Health
resource.description: This value set covers LOINC Codes for Women Health

resource.name: General Assessment
resource.description: This value set covers LOINC and SNOMED CT Codes for General Assessment

resource.name: Physical Activity
resource.description: This value set covers LOINC Codes for Physical Activity

resource.name: Body Measurement
resource.description: This value set covers LOINC Codes for Body Measurement

resource.name: Vital Signs
resource.description: This value set covers LOINC Codes for Vital Signs

resource.name: Alcohol Drinking Status
resource.description: This value set covers : All children (preferred term) of finding relating to alcohol drinking behavior (finding) of the SNOMED CT

resource.name: Tobacco Smoking Status
resource.description: This value set covers : All children (preferred term) of Finding relating to tobacco smoking behavior (finding) of the SNOMED CT

resource.name: Tobacco Chewing Status
resource.description: This value set covers : All children (preferred term) of Finding relating to tobacco chewing of the SNOMED CT

resource.name: Mental Status
resource.description: This value set covers : All children (preferred term) of finding relating to Emotional state finding (finding) of the SNOMED CT

resource.name: Diet Type
resource.description: This value set covers : All children (preferred term) of finding relating to Dietary finding (finding) of the SNOMED CT

resource.name: General Wellbeing
resource.description: This value set covers : All children (preferred term) of General well-being finding (finding) of the SNOMED CT
